modName: Dat Sun Dont Come Up No More
summary:
A small mod removing the daytime from skyrim for Vampire players. 

For KvatchHero
descriptionHtml:
A quick mod changing the skyrim climate so the sun never comes up. I made this by a request for KvatchHero. 

There shouldn\'t be any bugs since one little thing was changed but ho knows, stuff happens. Let me know about them and I will see what I can do. 

As for Compatibility as long as the mod doesn\'t mess with the when the sunset/sunrise begins/ends there should be no problems with them running together.

 Have fun Vampires, cuz the Sun dont come up no more.


I am currently working a much larger mod. The forum for it is [url=\"http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/692831-the-rise-of-death-wip/page__p__5488862#entry5488862\"]Here[/url]
author: FalloutBeast
